description: This file defines a function to show a modal bottom sheet for checkout in a Flutter application, rendering a summary of cart items, subtotal, tax, total, and a confirmation button. It interacts with cart and orders providers to manage state and trigger order placement.

methods.name: showCheckoutModal
methods.description: Displays a modal bottom sheet summarizing the cart contents and allowing the user to confirm their order. It retrieves cart data from the provider, displays line items, subtotal, tax, and total, and triggers order creation upon confirmation.
